items.name: BA Manhattan and Martini - 2 Pack
items.desc:
A pack of 2x 330ml bottles of barrel aged Martini and Manhattan Sours (1x Chardonnay, 1x Bourbon).
Released in celebration of our 7th Birthday, these are Barrel-Aged versions of our 2019 Martini and Manhattan Sours. These were aged in Chardonnay and Bourbon barrels for 18 months and then bottle conditioned for a smoother carbonation.
BA Martini - Chardonnay
Ageing in chardonnay barrels adds oak and subtle tannins. There's a slight ginger on the nose, melon and lemon with a tannic dry finish. Just add an olive and you would be mistaken for drinking the real deal.
BA Manhattan - Bourbon
The Manhattan Sour was aged in Wild Turkey barrels for 18 months. It is a complex sour with vanilla, sweet cherry and toasted oak flavour. It has a thick and jammy palate with a clean finish rounded out by the mild tannins.
Beer Style Barrel-Aged Kettle Sour   ABV Martini 5.2%   Ingredients Water, Barley, Wheat, Yeast, Hops, Lemon zest, Peach, White grape, Cardamom, Coriander seed, Chamomile
Allergens MALTED BARLEY,WHEAT   Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml bottle.
Beer Style Barrel-Aged Kettle Sour   ABV Manhattan 10.3%   Ingredients Water, Barley, Wheat, Yeast, Hops, Sweet Cherry, Orange zest, Cinnamon, Ginger
Allergens MALTED BARLEY,WHEAT   Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml bottle.

items.name: Baltic Porter
items.desc:
A smooth, long-lagered unfiltered Porter brewed with a large variety of UK, Belgian and German malts. Fermented at 8 degrees for the cleanest yeast profile possible. Sit back and savour the notes of dark chocolate and port.
Beer Style Baltic Porter   ABV 7%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast   Malt Lager Malt, Munich Malt, Special B, Melanoidin Malt, Black Malt, Brown Malt, Roasted Barley, Chocolate Malt   Yeast W34/70   Hops Saaz   Allergens BARLEY, GLUTEN
Vegan YES   Packed in 440ml can.

items.name: Blackhorse Stout
items.desc:
One of our returning seasonal range beers. A decadent, thick milk stout brewed with a plethora of speciality malt, fermented with a clean US ale strain. Serve slightly chilled to bring out the full character and body of the beer.
Beer Style Milk Stout   ABV 4.7%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Oats, Yeast, Lactose
Allergens Barley, Lactose, Oats, Gluten   Vegan No   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Cellared Pils
items.desc:
A traditional, dry and crisp Pilsner, with a dense head. Brewed with 3 varieties of Pilsner malt and Spelt for complex biscuit & vanilla-wafer notes. Matured cold for 8 weeks for maximum drinkability. Unfiltered and Un-fined.
Beer Style German Pilsner   ABV 5.2%   Ingredients Water, Barley, Spelt, Hops, Yeast   Malt Pilsner Malt, Bohemian Lager malt, Carafoam, Spelt   Yeast W34/70   Hops Tettnanger, Spalt Select   Allergens WHEAT, SPELT, BARLEY, GLUTEN
Vegan YES   Packed in 440ml can.

items.name: Extra Special Bitter
items.desc:
A full bodied traditional London Style Extra Special Bitter is exactly what you would expect from this traditional British beer. The perfect balance of Golden Promise, Best Ale, crystal and chocolate malts stacked against Fuggles, Bramlings Cross and Goldings. All UK malt for hedge-row fruit and biscuit notes over some delicious stone-fruit ester from a blend of English ale strains.
Beer Style Extra Special Bitter   ABV 5.2%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Wheat, Yeast   Malt  Golden promise, Best Ale, Crystal Medium, Dark Crystal, Chocolate Malt, Wheat Malt   Yeast Boddington's, Windsor Ale   Hops Bramling Cross, Fuggles, Goldings   Allergens WHEAT, BARLEY, GLUTEN
Vegan YES   Packed in 440ml can.

items.name: Heart n Soul
items.desc:
A collaboration with Villages Brewery and Lomond coffee, a % of every sale goes to Heart n Soul, an award winning charity also based in Deptford that believes in the power and talents of people with learning disabilities. Artwork is by Aysen, one of the talented artists they support
This beer is a rich, bitter brown ale brewed with a plethora of speciality malts. Fermented low and slow with a neutral US strain to provide a clean base to let the local Lomond coffee and classic dank US hop aromatics shine.
Beer Style American Brown Ale   ABV 6.5%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast, Coffee   Malt Golden Promise, Flaked Torrified Maize, Amber Malt, Crystal Medium, Brown Malt, Roasted Barley, Chit Barley   Yeast US-05   Hops Simco, Chinook   Allergens BARLEY   Vegan YES   Packed in 440ml can.

items.name: Lassi Sour
items.desc:
Inspired by North Indian Lassi's, this is a fresh, thick, modern sour. Expect pronounced natural yoghurt, lemon and perfumed aromatics from a complex array of adjuncts.
Beer Style Kettle Sour   ABV 3.9%   Ingredients Water, Wheat, Malted Barley, Oats, Yeast, Lemon Peel, Green cardamom, Pistachio Flour, Rose petals, Coconut flake, Vanilla, Yoghurt, Hops, Lactose, Gluten   Malt Wheat Malt, Flaked Wheat, Spelt, Chit Barley, Lager Malt,
Yeast USA 5   Hops N/A
Allergens WHEAT, BARLEY, OATS,GLUTEN, PISTACHIO FLOUR, COCONUT FLAKES, YOGHURT, LACTOSE
Vegan NO   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Lingonberry & Sloe Sour
items.desc:
A heavily fruited jammy sour ale, fermented with our house lactobacillus and kveik yeast. Ikea is not the only place you find Lingonberries. Please don't add any meatballs.
Beer Style Florida Weisse   ABV 4.8%   Ingredients Water, Wheat, Malted Barley, Oats, Yeast, Lactobacillus, Lingonberry juice, Sloe Puree, Hops   Malt LagerMalt, Torrified Wheat, Wheat Malt, Rolled Oats, Chit Barley
Yeast Stranda Kviek   Hops N/A
Allergens WHEAT, BARLEY, OATS,GLUTEN
Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Mixed of Foundation Range
items.desc:
A case of 24x 330ml cans from our Foundation Range (4 of Each).
Contains the following 330ml Cans:-
4x Peckham Pale
4.5%
4x Peckham Pils
4.8%    4 x Peckham Session 4.2%   4 x Peckham Helles 4.2%   4 x Peckham Rye 4.7%   4 x Blackhorse Stout 4.7%

items.name: Mixed of Peckham Pils & Peckham Pale
items.desc:
A case of 24x 330ml cans from our Foundation Range (4 of Each).
Contains the following 330ml Cans:-
12x Peckham Pale
4.5%
12x Peckham Pils
4.8%

items.name: Orange Crush Gose
items.desc:
A refreshing citrus forward gose. Orange juice and peel bring a distinct citrus flavour and aroma to the kettle sour base. Meyer lemon and mandarin, adds a sweet tang with a subtle bergamot herbal spice and fragrance which is emphasised by the additions of coriander seed and sea salt.
Beer Style Modern Gose   ABV 4.2%   Ingredients
Water, Malted Barley,Yeast, Hops, Salt Orange Peel, Blood Orange Juice, Coriander, Lactobacillus, Lactose
Malt Lager Malt,Wheat Malt,Rolled Oats, Chit Barley
Yeast Stranda Kviek   Hops N/A
Allergens BARLEY, OATS,GLUTEN, LACTOSE,
Vegan NO
Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Peckham Helles
items.desc:
Our first gluten-free beer, Peckham Helles is our take on the traditional Bavarian-style Helles lager. Straw yellow and filtered for a crystal clear clarity, Peckham Helles has a soft bitterness with light, fruity yeast esters and herbal spice from Hallertau Mittelfruh hops. Refreshing and moreish with a clean and crisp finish.
Beer Style Gluten-free Helles Lager
ABV 4.2%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast
Malt German Pilsner Malt
Yeas House Lager Yeast   Hops Hallertau Mittelfruh   Allergens N/A (however classified as GLUTEN REDUCED)
Vegan YES
Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Peckham Pale
items.desc:
Forming part of our Foundation Range, this pale ale has a ton of hop flavour with a bold citrus and tropical fruit aroma on a straw-coloured malt backbone.
Beer Style American Pale Ale
ABV 4.5%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Hops, Yeast   Malt Propino, Crystal, Vienna, Munich   Yeast US05   Hops Colombus, Ekuanot, Simcoe, Cascade   Allergens WHEAT, OATS, BARLEY
Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Peckham Pils
items.desc:
Forming part of our Foundation Range, this pilsner lager takes patience. To get it just right we lager the beer for up to 4 additional weeks. The result is a crisp, clear and refreshing beer.
Beer Style Pilsner Lager   ABV 4.8%   Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast   Malt Crisp Pilsner, Vienna, Munich   Yeast Swiss Lager Yeast   Hops Saaz   Allergens WHEAT, BARLEY   Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Peckham Rye
items.desc:
Made with Rye malt to add a dry and biscuit quality to the beer. With a caramel character, a bit of pine, citrus and spice from the hops this red ale sits right at home in our Foundation Range. Citrus on the noce with dry, spicy characteristics, rich and full body from North American hops, medium bitterness balanced with rich, caramel flavours and a residual sweetness. It's a beer that would pair nicely with a mature cheddar or BBQ'd meats.
Beer Style Red Ale
ABV 4.7%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Rye, Hops, Yeast   Malt Best Ale Malt, CaraRed, Rye, Roasted Barley, Munich   Yeast US05   Hops Chinook, Cascade, Columbus
Allergens WHEAT, BARLEY
Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Peckham Session
items.desc:
Inspired by sunny days spent on Peckham Rye, Peckham Session is a light and easy-going Session IPA. Packed with hops for a tropical and citrus punch. This East Coast style beer remains light and refreshing from the sessionable strength. London Ale yeast leaves residual sweetness, helping accentuate both malt and hop flavour and aroma.
Beer Style Session IPA
ABV 4.2%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast, Oats
Malt Pilsner Malt, Wheat Malt, Oat Flakes, Best Ale, Chit
Yeast London Ale 3
Hops Amarillo
Allergens WHEAT, OATS, BARLEY
Vegan YES
Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Strata Pale
items.desc:
Back by popular demand, this beer combines three juicy and tropical hops. Vic Secret brings passion fruit and sweet melon, Citrus adds stone fruit and citrus notes, while Strata adds a pungent blueberry juice. Hazy, juicy and very drinkable.
Beer Style Pale Ale   ABV 5.1%
Ingredients Water, Barley, Hops, Wheat, Yeast, Oats, Coriander   Malt Low colour Maris Otter, Wheat Malt, Flaked Barley, Rolled Oats   Yeast London Ale III   Hops Citra, Vic Secret, Strata   Allergens WHEAT, OATS, BARLEY, GLUTEN
Vegan YES   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Totally Tropical
items.desc:
Brewed in collaboration with our good friends Laine Brew Co. Brighton, this is a bright and balanced totally tropical session sour ale. Fermented with Kveik yeast and our house lactose with grapefruit zest and pineapple puree adding the punch.
Beer Style Florida Weisse   ABV 3.9%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Wheat, Yeast, Lactose, Grapefruit zest, Pineapple puree, Lactobacillus   Malt Lager Malt, Chit Marley, Wheat Malt   Yeast Stranda Kveik   Hops N/A   Allergens WHEAT, OATS, BARLEY, GLUTEN, LACTOSE
Vegan NO   Packed in 330ml can.

items.name: Winter DIPA
items.desc:
The clocks have just gone back which means the nights are now longer and the temperatures are dropping. Warm your cockles with this pungent, tropical DIPA. Dry-hopped at 22g per litre with Sabro, Ekuanot and Simcoe for intense mandarin, coconut and resinous aromatics.
Beer Style Double IPA   ABV 8.0%
Ingredients Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Wheat, Yeast, Coriander   Malt  Golden promise, Low colour Maris Otter, Golden Naked oats, Flaked Oats, Wheat Malt, Chit Barley   Yeast London Fog & Windsor   Hops HBC472, Simcoe, Ekuanot, Sabro   Allergens WHEAT, BARLEY, GLUTEN
Vegan YES   Packed in 440ml can.
